price: Ishee keessatti qabbanas ta'ee dhugaatii hin dhandhamanu.
arabic: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرۡدٗا وَلَا شَرَابًا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: lā yadhūqūna fīhā bardan walā sharāban
